byline.original: By NOAH REMNICK and BENJAMIN MUELLER

abstract: Stephen Hewett-Brown is crushed to death by malfunctioning elevator in Lower East Side building; had been trying to hoist other passengers out of elevator after it stopped between floors when car lurched downward, pinning him between ceiling and third floor of building; elevator had been subject of dozens of complaints to New York City Buildings Dept in past.

headline.print_headline: Man Crushed by Elevator at Building That Had Complaints
headline.main: Man Crushed by Elevator at Building That Had a History of Complaints

snippet: Stephen Hewett-Brown, 25, helped a resident escape a broken elevator on the Lower East Side shortly before he was crushed, witnesses said.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Hewett-Brown, 25, helped a resident escape a broken elevator on the Lower East Side shortly before he was crushed, witnesses said.
